headline: Senate committee delays crypto market structure hearing amid industry pushback: CNBC Crypto World
summary: On today's episode of CNBC Crypto World, major cryptocurrencies slide after the Senate Banking Committee postpones a hearing on crypto market structure legislation. And, Summer Mersinger, CEO of the Blockchain Association, reacts to the hearing's delay and shares her thoughts on the text of the legislation.

raw.headline: Senate committee delays crypto market structure hearing amid industry pushback: CNBC Crypto World

And, Summer Mersinger, CEO of the Blockchain Association, reacts to the hearing's delay and shares her thoughts on the text of the legislation.

headline: Crypto's CLARITY Act markup delayed: It's a 'significant' setback
summary: The Senate has delayed its markup of the CLARITY Act, which would have been a critical step for the landmark crypto legislation. The delay is a notable setback for investors' hopes of seeing crypto regulation this year. Additionally, Coinbase (COIN) CEO Brian Armstrong withdrew his support of the bill in its current form, noting that it would be worse than no bill at all. Bitwise Asset Management chief investment officer Matt Hougan sits down with Opening Bid host Brian Sozzi to discuss the latest crypto headlines and how these setbacks impact the industry as a whole. Bitwise operates several of its own bitcoin (BITB, BITC, BTOP) and crypto (BITQ, BITW) exchange-traded funds (ETFs). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.

headline: Crypto Firms Buoyed by Trump Get Rocked as Crucial Bill Delayed
summary: The Senate Banking Committee on Wednesday delayed its discussion of the bill, hours after Coinbase Global Inc. pulled its support for the latest version.  Among elements of the bill Coinbase and other firms are lashing out against are limits on their ability to offer yield or rewards on customers’ stablecoin holdings.  After their success helping get Trump elected and the stablecoin bill passed, crypto executives now fear the impasse over tokens pegged to the dollar could prevent the US regulatory framework from catching up with other markets.

raw.headline: Crypto Firms Buoyed by Trump Get Rocked as Crucial Bill Delayed
raw.summary: The Senate Banking Committee on Wednesday delayed its discussion of the bill, hours after Coinbase Global Inc. pulled its support for the latest version.  Among elements of the bill Coinbase and other firms are lashing out against are limits on their ability to offer yield or rewards on customers’ stablecoin holdings.  After their success helping get Trump elected and the stablecoin bill passed, crypto executives now fear the impasse over tokens pegged to the dollar could prevent the US regulatory framework from catching up with other markets.

headline: Senate Crypto Bill Hits a Snag as Coinbase Pulls Support. Why Bitcoin Is Still Up.
summary: The committee was due to consider the Digital Asset Market Clarity Act on Thursday after publishing a draft proposal of the market structure legislation earlier this week.  Bitcoin  was trading at $96,703 early in the day, up 1.7% over the past 24 hours, according to CoinDesk.  Senate Banking Committee chair Tim Scott said “everyone remains at the table working in good faith,” in a post on X, describing the delay as a “brief pause.”
